publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1026.1 Mr Murray Tosh: Petrol and Diesel Prices—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1026) in the name of Mr Kenny MacAskill, leave out from "through rising" to end and insert "and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government with a view to ensuring that fuel prices in Scotland are kept broadly in line with those of neighbouring countries and that prices in remoter areas are brought into line with those in other areas of Scotland."
